title: Tarromin potion (unf)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A tarromin potion (unf) is an unfinished potion made by using a tarromin on a vial of water, requiring 12 Herblore. Using a limpwurt root on a tarromin potion (unf) with 12 Herblore yields a Strength potion(3) and 50 Herblore experience. In the Shades of Mort'ton quest, after reading Diary of Herbi Flax, using ashes on a tarromin potion (unf) with 15 Herblore yields a Serum 207 (3) and 50 Herblore experience. In the Grim Tales quest, using shrunk ogleroot on a tarromin potion (unf) with 52 Herblore yields a Shrink-me-quick and 6 Herblore experience.

Item ID95

A tarromin potion (unf) is an unfinished potion made by using a tarromin on a vial of water, requiring 12 Herblore. Using a limpwurt root on a tarromin potion (unf) with 12 Herblore yields a Strength potion(3) and 50 Herblore experience. In the Shades of Mort'ton quest, after reading Diary of Herbi Flax, using ashes on a tarromin potion (unf) with 15 Herblore yields a Serum 207 (3) and 50 Herblore experience. In the Grim Tales quest, using shrunk ogleroot on a tarromin potion (unf) with 52 Herblore yields a Shrink-me-quick and 6 Herblore experience.
